name: places/ChIJfYdWZ8z3wokRVykuvxencKs
formattedAddress: 307 W 105th St, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 307 W 105th St, New York, NY 10025-3416, USA

originalText.text:
When I initially became an author I wanted to get new photos for an upcoming events. I was fortunate enough to already have worked with Melissa in the past and remembered that she always exceeded my expectations.

What stands out to me the most about Melissa is her attention to detail and the fact that she always makes sure that she captures authentic, natural, beautiful photos. She strives to deliver stunning images that her clients will be proud to share.

She is not only a master behind the camera, but she is personable, professional, and makes you feel comfortable and confident throughout the entire session.

I have worked with Melissa several times over the past decade and it was always a positive experience from the moment I make the initial phone call until I receive the final results. I have and will continue to highly recommend her services to anyone in need of standout photos in a relaxed environment.

If you're looking for a photographer who will go above and beyond, exceed your expectations, and capture extraordinary photos, then you should definitely book a session with Melissa.

originalText.text: Melissa was fantastic and so easy to work with. She told me exactly what I needed to wear and arranged for a marvelous make up artist too. During the session, she had me pose in multiple different angles to help find the best one. She also provided me with dozens of photos, so I could select the one I liked best. Her retoucher also did an excellent job making small, subtle, but critical changes. I have received so many compliments on the photo and have recommended Melissa to everyone.

text.text: Melissa was fantastic and so easy to work with. She told me exactly what I needed to wear and arranged for a marvelous make up artist too. During the session, she had me pose in multiple different angles to help find the best one. She also provided me with dozens of photos, so I could select the one I liked best. Her retoucher also did an excellent job making small, subtle, but critical changes. I have received so many compliments on the photo and have recommended Melissa to everyone.

originalText.text: I never am good at getting pictures taken, but when I've worked with Melissa it's like hanging with a friend (with a camera), and the session always yields a slew of natural, truthful choices. I cannot recommend her talents and expertise highly enough. I've paid a lot more for almost as good, Melissa has the highest respect for working actors which is reflected in her very reasonable prices.

I cannot recommend her talents and expertise highly enough. originalText.text: Melissa is such a creative, kind-hearted professional! She made my daughter feel so comfortable on her first "real" studio shoot and knew just how to capture her natural beauty. Her studio location was very convenient and allowed for a variety of settings both indoors and outside. I highly recommend her for anyone looking for an updated or new headshot.

text.text: Melissa is such a creative, kind-hearted professional! She made my daughter feel so comfortable on her first "real" studio shoot and knew just how to capture her natural beauty. Her studio location was very convenient and allowed for a variety of settings both indoors and outside. I highly recommend her for anyone looking for an updated or new headshot.

originalText.text: Melissa took my professional photo last year and it was such a relaxed and easy atmosphere. Her team set me up and we ended up doing the shot outside which worked out perfectly. Melissa is a natural behind the lens and made me feel comfortable the entire time. Would recommend her services for professional photos in addition to her amazing head shot portfolio.
